description:
With the situation looking increasingly dire, Isami and Bravern must somehow find a way to defeat the two Deathdrives standing in their way without backup.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Isami! Oretachi de, Sekai o Sukuunda!!
Isami! We Must Save the World Together!
イサミィ! 俺たちで, 世界を救うんだ!!
